title: Is Your Internal Developer Platform Missing Orchestration?
author: Jennifer Riggins
description: A developer portal works top-down. Terraform and Kubernetes have teams building bottom-up. What about a platform engineering strategy that works from the middle out?
cntitle: 您的内部开发者平台缺少编排功能吗？
cndescription: 开发者门户自上而下运作。Terraform 和 Kubernetes 的团队自下而上构建。那么，从中间向外运作的平台工程策略呢？
